rina.title: Cloud Backend Developer
rina.description: I'm responsible for developing the serverless backend in Python on Azure Functions for RINA's digital certification platform, primarily aimed at steel mill clients who want to certify their environmental sustainability commitments.

rulex.title: Full Stack Developer
rulex.description: I was responsible for software development with a focus on communication between microservices, REST APIs, and DevOps activities (CI/CD, deployment, and cloud testing). I worked primarily with Python and Azure DevOps Pipelines, and performed JavaScript maintenance for the Electron application of the Rulex Platform.

exerciser.title: University Exerciser
exerciser.description: University exerciser position for the General Physics course aimed at students of the Chemical and Electrical Engineering degree programs during the academic years 2019-2020 and 2020-2021. I conducted both frontal lectures and guided exercise sessions.

tutor.title: University Tutor
tutor.description: I held a didactic tutoring position for General Physics, Mathematical Analysis, and Linear Algebra for first-year students of the Physics and Mathematics degree courses at the University of Genoa.

msc.description: Specialized in theoretical physics, with a focus on quantum field theory.

phd.description: Conducted research on cosmological parameter constraints using the 6x2pt formalism, which combines weak lensing, galaxy clustering, and their cross-correlations to improve constraints on dark energy equation of state parameters.
